about_the_game: This is the Original Soundtrack for Get-A-Grip Chip - an outrageously fun indie platformer, wherein you play as a robot laborer making a glorious escape from an exploitative factory of horrors. It's good and righteous fun, and the soundtrack, I pray, reflects that.
detailed_description: This is the Original Soundtrack for Get-A-Grip Chip - an outrageously fun indie platformer, wherein you play as a robot laborer making a glorious escape from an exploitative factory of horrors. It's good and righteous fun, and the soundtrack, I pray, reflects that.
legal_notice: All music written by Eva Lawitts. ©2020 Invisible Planet Records All Rights Reserved.
name: Get-A-Grip Chip (Original Game Soundtrack)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 86 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 750 MB available space
